attributes.action: Take action against right wing and extremist web pages and facebook pages .
attributes.background: With the current spike in hate crime against minority races and relgions . It is the duty of the government to adress the content of these extremist and dangerous pages .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure what you mean by "take action". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
